original_text: his father and mother shall take hold of him and bring him to the elders at the gate of his town.
korean_text: 그의 부모가 그를 끌고 성문에 이르러 그 성읍 장로들에게 나아가서

sentences.original_text: His father and mother shall take hold of him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지와 어머니가 그를 붙잡을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and bring him to the elders
at the gate of his town
